title: The field of 2020 Democrats is about to winnow: Shawna Thomas, Sahil Kapur and Charlie Cook
description: Chuck Todd, moderator of "Meet the Press," sits down with Shawna Thomas, bureau chief at Vice News, and Sahil Kapur, national politics reporter at Bloomberg News, talk about the winnowing 2020 Democratic field. Plus, founder of Cook Political Report and co-author of the 2019 Almanac of American Politics Charlie Cook talks the latest version of the Almanac.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
